description: Primes with 39 as smallest positive primitive root.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..660
mathematica: Select[ Prime@Range@221000, PrimitiveRoot@# == 39 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 11 2001 *)
prog: (PARI) is(n)=if(n<9||!isprime(n), return(0)); for(k=2,38,if(znorder(Mod(k,n))==n-1, return(0))); znorder(Mod(39,n))==n-1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 28 2015
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 06 2001
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 11 2001 and Dec 21 2005
